testcase.classname: Add an account in eLearning portal; send mail from this account and acknowledge mail sent to sender
testcase.name: Create an account and Send mail with newly created account
testcase.system-out: Given Launch the eLearning portal...........................................passed When User clicked signup button.............................................passed And Create User and verify user created.....................................passed And Send Mail...............................................................passed Then Verify Acknowledge message.............................................passed
